comments:
Driver:  WTP 1.5.3 02/02 driver

When going through Web service scenario with no initial selection, change the combo to top-down Java bean Web service, click Browse and try to paste in 

http://api.google.com/GoogleSearch.wsdl

In a few instances, pasting the URL in results in nothing being pasted.  The same thing happens on the first page of the wizard.  Then I started typing and try pasting in something shorter and it's OK.  Then pasting in the original URL works as well except when I click Finish, I got:

IWAB0014E Unexpected exception occured.
  Path must include project and resource name: /
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path must include project and resource name: /
      at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Unknown Source)
      at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.newResource(Unknown Source)
      at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Container.getFile(Unknown Source)
      at com.ibm.etools.webservice.was.consumption.util.PlatformUtils.getFileURLFromPlatform(Unknown Source)
      at com.ibm.etools.webservice.was.creation.ui.task.DefaultsForWSDL2SkeletonTask.execute(Unknown Source)

I tried a few more times and was not able to reproduce the problem consistently.  I'll try again to see if I could reproduce the problem more consistently.
Kathy, assigned back to you since you're still investigating.

I have the same error while validating a JSP:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Path must include project and resource name: /AbsBaseVariables.jsp
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isLegal(Assert.java:62)

Closing.  Have not seen this problem lately.
